emulator

Interface Utils


  • public interface Utils
    Collection of commonly used conversions and print statements.
    Author:
    Daniel Simpkins

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean getBit(byte in, int bitNum)
      Gives the state of a bit numbering from 0-7
      static java.lang.String hex(int num)
      Converts a decimal value into printable hex value.
      static void PrintInstruction(java.lang.String decodedIns, byte ins, int location, byte[] parameters, int paramSize)
      Prints a formatted readout of the executed instruction.

    • Method Detail

      • hex

        static java.lang.String hex(int num)
        Converts a decimal value into printable hex value.
        Parameters:
        num - Decimal value number.
        Returns:
        Printable hex value.

      • PrintInstruction

        static void PrintInstruction(java.lang.String decodedIns,
                             byte ins,
                             int location,
                             byte[] parameters,
                             int paramSize)
        Prints a formatted readout of the executed instruction.
        Parameters:
        decodedIns - Decoded opcode into instruction.
        ins - Hex value of the opcode.
        location - Location in memory of the executed instruciton
        parameters - All parameters the instruction used.
        paramSize - Number parameters the instruction used.

      • getBit

        static boolean getBit(byte in,
                      int bitNum)
        Gives the state of a bit numbering from 0-7
        Parameters:
        in - Byte to parse.
        bitNum - Bit position to return
        Returns:
        State of bitNum in in.
